group_1.textLeft: Are you ready?

group_1.textRight: Who do ya think you're talking to?

group_1.textLeft: Alright, here we go.@Dance game...
"Dog Drug Reinforcement."
[chara:200450:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Wha...

group_1.textRight: [chara:200652:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Hey!
Hey!@Sayakaaa...

group_1.textLeft: My bad!@I was a little off at the end...

group_1.textRight: We won't make the score if@we don't both time it right!

group_1.textLeft: Sorry... I know already, I need to work even harder.
You're even putting up with@following my selfishness.

group_1.textRight: Not that I really mind it, since I'm@getting something out of it too.
That's why we paired up to compete, after all.

group_1.textLeft: That's right.
Because the prize for the top-scoring duo is...

group_1.narration: "A magical chocolate cake that@makes your wishes come true!"

group_1.textRight: What are you gonna wish for with your cake?

group_1.textLeft: Oh, I, uh...y'know.
A childhood friend of mine...@He just got out of the hospital...

group_1.textRight: ...Listen, you don't have to say@anything if you don't want to.
Compared to you, I'm a lot more easygoing.

group_1.textLeft: Is that so?@So what do you want...?

group_1.textRight: Well, obviously...
I want a bite of that magic cake!@Doesn't it make your mouth water?

group_1.textLeft: [chara:200450:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]You're gonna wish for that? Even though@you only get one wish per person...

group_1.textRight: No...actually, hold up...
I still get to eat it after I wish for something, right?
I guess I'll have to come up with a wish, then.
Hmmm, lemme think...@What would be some good eats...?

group_1.textLeft: [chara:200450:effect_emotion_sad_0][se:7224_fall_into]In the end, it's still food...

group_1.narration: [textBlack:Money can buy fake,@Money can't buy true.]
[textBlack:Parasols won't let you see,@Love-brellas are for two.]
[textBlack:You'll starve however much you eat.@And love lies truly out of reach.]

group_1.textLeft: So, this is where those two were...

group_1.textRight: We were lucky to find them, but...

group_1.textLeft: Now we've been separated from@Madoka and Homura again...

group_1.textRight: We'll have to join up with them again@after we rescue Kyoko's team.

group_1.textLeft: But, it looks like...
...Those two can't see us at all.

group_1.textRight: Yes, you're right.
And it seems that cake has ended up as the prize.
I'm not sure how that happened...
But this time, at least it's clear what we need to do.

group_1.textLeft: You said it!
The two of us together will get@the highest score in the universe.
And then we'll get back the best@chocolate cake in the universe!

group_1.textRight: Er... Yes, well, we did work quite hard on it together.

group_1.textLeft: ...Were you thinking of something else?

group_1.textRight: We're on the same track,@right down to getting the cake back.
...And after we get it back,@what do you think comes next?
We'll both get to make a wish@on a piece of chocolate cake.

group_1.textLeft: A wish...?

group_1.textRight: Yes, for the first wish, I'd like to invite@Madoka's group to this spot.
Then we'll have all six of us right here.
And we can use the other wish to wake everyone up.

group_1.textLeft: I see, I see!
But will the cake really grant our wishes?

group_1.textRight: I'm sure they'll come true.@...This is a dream, after all.
